loan.name: Deo
loan.use: to buy manure to boost soil nutrition.
loan.description:
Deo lives in Rewensinga Kyavu, Kyotera District. He is married and a father of ten children. He is a farmer and manages a banana plantation as his main source of income. He is challenged by low prices for his bananas and poor transport options despite his persistence.

Deo has requested a 2,000,000 UGX loan to buy manure to boost his farm's soil nutrition and production. He believes he will become a big Matooke (a variety of starchy banana) trader in Kyavu in the coming years.

Deo is thankful that funders support him financially and enable him to provide for his family and, more importantly, educate his children, some of which are graduates.
loan.whySpecial: It helps rural farmers to increase productivity and their income.
